reviewText: I thought it was wonderful.  It teaches what I was taught when going to my  PRECIOUS BLOOD school. I told my sister we need to watch both tapes with the children.

Father Wade Menezes is a very holy compassionate Priest and his talks have changed my life for the better. I have this DVD and others. His talks with FR. BILL CASEY called THIRST FOR TRUTH-BATTLE FOR SOULS is incredibly the best talks I've heard in years. I would recommend this as a must for anyone and especially those who needs a wakeup call in their spiritual life.
These videos are great for Catholics wishing to do a Retreat in the confines of their homes!
